name: 2015 The 2nd International Biotechnology, Chemical Engineering and Life Science Conference
content: The aim objective of IBCELC is to provide a platform for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Networking and Digital Society. This conference provides opportunities for the delegates to exchange new ideas and application experiences face to face, to establish business or research relations and to find global partners for future collaboration.
